testcase.name: validate Login
testcase.system-out: Given user enter "admin@yourstore.com" text into "Email"....................passed When user enter "admin" text into "Password"................................passed When user click on "Log in".................................................passed And user click on "Catalog".................................................passed And user click on "Products"................................................passed Then assert "Products" is displayed in header...............................passed When user enter "Build your own computer" text into "SearchProductName".....passed And user click on "Product type" dropdown...................................passed And user click on "Simple"..................................................passed And user click on "search-products" button..................................passed Then assert "Build your own computer" is displayed in section Learn more about "products".passed When user enter "Samsung Series 9 NP900X4C Premium Ultrabook" text into "SearchProductName".passed And user click on "Categories"..............................................passed Then assert "Categories" is displayed in header.............................passed When user enter "Apparel" text into "SearchCategoryName"....................passed And user click on "Published" dropdown......................................passed And user click on "Published only"..........................................passed And user click on "search-categories" button................................passed Then assert "Apparel" is displayed in section Learn more about "categories".passed And user click on "Manufacturers"...........................................passed Then assert "Manufacturers" is displayed in header..........................passed
